ModMetaData.name: [KYD] More Condiments
ModMetaData.author: Kayedon, TurtleShroom
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod adds two new condiments for use in Vanilla Cooking Expanded or Sauced Meal recipes, to add some more uses to a few items that I find myself drowning in.
You can turn ten Royal Insect Jellies into Royal Jelly Preserves. Royal Jelly Preserves give postive three Mood Points and thirty percent Immunity Gain Speed for six hours.
You can turn ten Honeys into Honey Syrup. Honey Syrup gives six Mood Points for a brief period of time.
Got some more condiment ideas? Let me know in the comments!
